name: SHArcade
0:
”Alexa, open arcade susie hannah”
”Pokemon battle”
”bring opponent to battle”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: arcade susie hannah
des:
There are three games: Gypsy, Fortune Teller, and Pokemon Battle. Gypsy is a game where you can ask several questions and Gypsy will answer your question with a yes, no, or a maybe. Fortune Teller is a game where u can ask Alexa for your fortune, and Alexa will simply give you your fortune. Lastly, Pokemon Battle is a story telling game. All you have to do is make several choices, and the story will change depending on what you choose. Pokemon Battle has many different scenarios, so you may play multiple times. It's also your choice if you want to play another game after each time you play.

*If you have trouble at any time, say "help."

These are the question you may ask while playing Gypsy:
1. Will I die soon
2. Will I go to college
3. Will I get a good job
4. Will I become a doctor
5. Will I become a hobo
6. Do I love my dog
7. Do I love my cat
8. Do I love my family
9. Does my dog love me
10. Does my cat love me
11. Does my family love me
*Alexa will answer with a yes, no, or maybe
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
